explanation: Funds are required to:complete efforts to enable current-force Distributed Common Ground System-Army (DCGS-A) systems to operate with Intelligence Community Common Data Fabric (CDF), Capability Drop 2 (CD2), Tactical Intelligence Targeting Access Node (TITAN) and tactical CDF; delivers

Funds are required for Distributed Common Ground System (DCGS) Contractor Logistics Support (CLS) spares, software, and supporting the DCGS enterprise end-user network, cross-functional application users, data network users, and service desk management support. Additionally, these funds will provide hardware, warranty and maintenance for common server and storage systems throughout the enterprise. This is a MIP project.
Funds are required for classified efforts. Additional classified details will be provided under separate cover. These are MIP projects.
Funds are available in the MQ-1C Gray Eagle program because of excess to need. The U.S. Central Command (USCENTCOM) requirements are reduced due to Afghanistan drawdown. This is a MIP project.
Funds are available in the RQ-21 program due to the changing mission set of the Navy as the result of the draw down in the USCENTCOM Area of Responsibility. This is a MIP project.
Funding is available due to reduced operational usage of the Airborne Reconnaissance system. The funding is excess to need. This is a MIP project.
